text: This is the worst day ever
I am furious about what happened
I feel scared when I walk alone
Wow, I did not expect that
I love spending time with my friends
The dark alley makes me nervous
Why did this happen to me
She surprised me with a party
I am neither happy nor sad
I am worried about the exam
I am thrilled about the news
Walking alone at night is scary
I am overjoyed with my success
Why did you shout at me
I am nervous about the presentation
What a shocking turn of events
I feel afraid of the dark
